title: r/Entitledparents "Your English Is SOO Bad! Where'd You Learn it?" "England..."
description:
r/Entitledparents In today's episode, an entitled Karen confronts a woman from England, and starts screaming at her for her "terrible English." She even accuses OP's mom of being a terrorist, because she mistakes Welsh for Arabic. So not only is this Karen entitled, she's also racist! If you enjoyed this video and want to see more, hit the subscribe button for daily Reddit podcasts!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d10sJc4j5hY
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
